name: Nephthys
temple_description: One of the nine pillar goddesses of Heliopolis in ancient Egyptian mythology, and possesses powerful divine powers. She was the daughter of Geb and Nuit and is the guardian deity of Lodgings & Death. She often helped her sister, Isis, the Egyptian Goddess of Life, to raise her offspring—Horus—and saved Horus from danger many times.

active_skills.name: Life Harvest
active_skills.effect: Guaranteed CRIT if target's HP is below 50%

active_skills.name: Life Restore
active_skills.effect: Heals 2 allies with lowest HP% by 50% of ATK
